name: logseq-toc-plugin
description: Interactive (style-able), real-time rendering of Table of Contents.

scripts.dev: rm -R dist && echo 'dist folder removed'; postcss src/tailwind.css -o src/App.css && parcel build --no-source-maps --no-optimize src/index.html --public-url ./
scripts.build: postcss src/tailwind.css -o src/App.css && parcel build --no-source-maps --no-optimize src/index.html --public-url ./

author: hkgnp
